article_title: State Senate approves 'Scarlet Letter' bill for Obamacare clients
article_text:
State Senate approves 'Scarlet Letter' bill for Obamacare clients

Photo: Tetra Images, File / Getty Supporters of a bill requiring a special identification on...

If you buy insurance through the Obamacare insurance exchange in Texas, your doctors are going to know about it. The question now is what they'll do about it.

og.description: Physicians pushed for the measure to avoid a retroactive denial of payment if a patient stops paying the insurance premium. But consumer advocates and health plans are concerned the label will be used to deny care to patients with marketplace plans.
